CLICK HERE TO ORDER NOW >>
Click to expand...

WeLoveServers VPS hosting allows you to leverage the power of a dedicated server at a fraction of the cost. Our underlying platform is powered by OpenVZ for top notch reliability and performance. We utilize Intel Xeon Hexa Core processors with hardware RAID10, we don't cut corners when it comes to hardware. That's why you'll find that we use enterprise class server hardware only, we never have and never will use desktop-grade hardware!

Specifications of our VPS's:
  • Hosted on Dual Intel Xeon Hexa-Core processors with hardware RAID10 to ensure redundancy and high performance. All backed with robust infrastructure and a premium multi-homed network.
  • OpenVZ-based for minimal virtualization overhead
  • Instant VPS Setup (i.e. start using your VPS right away!)
  • 99.9% Uptime
  • Full Root Access (full control over your VPS!)
  • Additional IPv4 Addresses Available
  • Choice of Linux OS: CentOS, Debian, Ubuntu, more upon request.
  • Access to VPS CP to manage your VPS (ex: starting, stopping, rebooting server without needing to email support)

Network Information
